IEEE Recommended Practice for Data Communications Between Intelligent Electronic Devices and Remote Terminal Units in a Substation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A uniform set of guidelines for communications and inter-operations of Intelligent Electronic Devices (IEDs) and Remote Terminal Units (RTUs) in an electric utility substation is provided. A mechanism for adding data elements and message structures to this recommended practice is described.
